title: Why does everyone hate Ed Sheeran so much? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you look at the story, you see that’s not “people”. That’s twitter, which is a biased sample of loudly opinionated people. When you consider what has been posted to others on twitter (including death and rape threats), Sheeran has had very mild abuse. I wouldn’t call it “hate”, quite a lot of it seems to be a very tired ginger busker joke. Yawn. But why did he become a target, even in a relatively mild way? Probably ubiquity and a feeling that the people who praise his stuff do so uncritically and to an unwarranted degree. I mean, he’s fine, but he gets lauded as some incredible once-in-a-generation original talent, which is a bit of a stretch. To be fair, I don’t think he does that, it’s unimaginative press mostly.

The question is “Why doesn’t everyone hate Ed Sheeran enough”? I can’t stand his whimpering, pouting, whining mouth just like the rest of today’s ‘weemale’ noise makers. And… Yes. He can make himself more presentable looking, starting with a shower. Comb his hair. Then shave off all the hideous red pubic looking hairs from his face. Wear something classier than that lumberjack shirt or the army jacket. I don’t normally believe in tanning spas, but he can use some color. He looks like a zombie from The Walking Dead.
